//reg [31:0] Instruction, reg [31:0] PC_Plus4
//xxxxxxxxxInstructionxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxPC_Plus4xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx 
//xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxxx xxxxx xxxxx] xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
//xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxxx] xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
10001100000000010000000000000000	//0
//load from 0 to 1, then check
00000000000000010000100000100000
00000000000000010000100000100000	//2
//load form 1 to 2, then check
10001100000000100000000000000001
00000000000000100001000000100000	//4
//add 1 & 2 to 3, check
00000000001000100001100000100000
00000000000000110001100000100000	//6
//subtract 3 from 1 to 4, check
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
00000000001000110010000000100010
00000000000001000010000000100000	//8
//stl 1 < 4 to 5, check
00000000100000010010100000101010
00000000000001010010100000100000	//10
//sw
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
10101100000000110000000000000110
1010110001100100000000000000010000000000000000000000000000001100	//12
1000110001100110000000000000001100000000000000000000000000001101
1000110000000111000000000000011100000000000000000000000000001110	//14
0000000000000110001100000010000000000000000000000000000000001111
0000000000000111001110000010000000000000000000000000000000010000	//16
//should not brnch
0001000000100000000000000000000100000000000000000000000000010001
0000000000000100001000000010000000000000000000000000000000010010	//18
//should branch
0001000000000000000000000000000100000000000000000000000000010011
0000000000000100001000000010000000000000000000000000000000010100	//20
//
//addi: 0 and (10) to 8
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
0010000000001000000000000000101000000000000000000000000000010101
0000000000001000010000000010000000000000000000000000000000010110	//22
//addi: 3 to (-2) to 9
0010000001101001111111111111111000000000000000000000000000010111
0000000000001001010010000010000000000000000000000000000000011000	//24
//j
0000100000000000000000000000001100000000000000000000000000011001
//
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
//addiu: 3 and (-1) to 10
0010010001101010111111111111111100000000000000000000000000011010	//26
0000000000001010010100000010000000000000000000000000000000011011
//addiu: 3 and (-big) to 11
0010010001101011111110000000000000000000000000000000000000011100	//28
0000000000001011010110000010000000000000000000000000000000011101
//andi: 3 and (2) to 12
0011000001101100000000000000001000000000000000000000000000011110	//30
0000000000001100011000000010000000000000000000000000000000011111
//andi: 3 and (big) to 13
0011000001101101000000000011111100000000000000000000000000100000	//32
0000000000001101011010000010000000000000000000000000000000100001
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
//bne: should branch
0001010001100001000000000000000100000000000000000000000000100010	//34
0000000000000011000110000010000000000000000000000000000000100011
//bne: should not branch
0001010001100011000000000000000100000000000000000000000000100100	//36
0000000000000011000110000010000000000000000000000000000000100101
//ori: 3 or (big) to 14
0011010001101110000000000011100100000000000000000000000000100110	//38
0000000000001110011100000010000000000000000000000000000000100111
//slti: 
0010100001101111000000000000000100000000000000000000000000101000	//40
0000000000001111011110000010000000000000000000000000000000101001
//slti: 
0010100001110000000000000000100000000000000000000000000000101010	//42
0000000000010000100000000010000000000000000000000000000000101011
